titleStmt.title: The articles of the svrrender of the city of Yorke to the Earle of Leven, Lord Fairefax, and Earle of Manchester, on Tuesday July 16, 1644 together with an explanation of some part of the articles.
titleStmt.author: Leven, Alexander Leslie, Earl of, 1580?-1661.
Fairfax, Ferdinando Fairfax, Baron, 1584-1648.
Manchester, Edward Montagu, Earl of, 1602-1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
